title: How Billionaires Use Money to Influence Politics
summary: This article talks about how very rich people, called billionaires, are using their money to have a big say in politics. In America, billionaires are spending a lot of money on elections to help candidates they like. For example, in 2024, the top 100 richest Americans spent over $1 billion on elections, which is much more than in 2004. This is because there are more billionaires now, and they have a lot of money to spend. Some people think this is bad for the country because it gives billionaires too much power. The article also mentions that rules about money in politics have changed, making it easier for billionaires to give money. This is a big topic as elections happen, and it shows how money and politics are connected.

background_read: This article is about how billionaires, who are extremely wealthy people, are using their money to influence politics in the United States. It explains that as elections happen, billionaires spend huge amounts of money to support candidates they like. This is a concern because it might give them too much power over who gets elected and what laws are made. The article uses examples from recent years to show how this spending has increased a lot. It's important for kids to understand that money can affect how our government works, and this topic helps us think about fairness in elections.
